title: Department of Computer Application
bannerCon: Where coding meets creativity, shaping the next generation of IT professionals.

items.subTitle: Overview
items.contents: The Department of Computer Applications was established in 2006 with the intent to provide quality education to the young aspirants. A team of 19 teaching and 05 technical staff members under the leadership of Dr. G.Devika unanimously harnesses its potential in all aspects to take the department to greater heights. The department had intake of 60 in 2006 and now the current intake for the undergraduate programme is 180. The Postgraduate (PG) programme in Computer Applications has a student intake of 120. Our curriculum is well structured and provides a strong foundation in every area of Computer Applications. The curriculum of the course syllabus comprises both classroom-based teachings as well as practical training along with internship programs. The curriculum can be persistently upgraded and revamped to prepare the students with all the necessary competencies in order to excel and become future-ready professionals as part of the workforce. Students are regularly placed in top MNCs with an average package of 13.5 LPA. Our students are pursuing higher education in top universities (Indian as well as Foreign). The department encourages students to participate in various National and International level competitions, project exhibitions, hackathons, sports events and extra-curricular activities. Students have won awards in various competitions including significant achievements in Smart India Hackathon. Department is also assisting students in getting internships at niche companies with pre-placement offer

content.text: Total Number of NPTEL Courses Completed

content.caption: Professor and Head
content.content: It is my distinct honour to serve as the Head of the Department of such an amazing and exciting place, and along with all our faculty members we welcome you to our home. It is my goal everyday to lead the Computing Streams towards an unmatched commitment to student success, the pursuit of research discoveries, and to support of our industry and community partners. In addition to our world-class degree programs, many of our students participate in extracurricular activities including regional programming contests, technical competitions, internships, and faculty directed research projects

content.content: Mr. G. Ravishankar, Assistant Professor, received the Best Assistant Professor Award from Silampoli Foundations for the year 2025.
Mr. S. Prabhu, Assistant Professor, received an Award for Social Service from Sindhanai Siragukal Nagai Sangamam in the year 2024.
Mr. S. Prabhu, Assistant Professor, received the Best Teacher Award from Mazhilchi in the year 2024.
Mr. G. Ravishankar received the Exceptional Changemaker Award from SAMMAT Foundation for the year 2023.

col2.text: Dr. G. Devika acted as an Examiner for the Ph.D. Viva Voce on 12th August 2025 at Providence College, Coonoor.

Mrs. P. Shalini participated in a Two-Day National Level Conference on “Road Map to Viksit Bharat – A Multi-Disciplinary Approach”, organized by THETA at Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT), Chennai, from 26th July 2025 to 27th July 2025.

col1.text: Mr. S. Prabhu and Mr. S. R. Dharan

col2.text: Mr. S. Prabhu and Mr. S. R. Dharan successfully completed the ICT Academy 5-Day Faculty Development Program (FDP) on Microsoft Power BI Data Analyst Associate at PSG College of Arts and Science, Coimbatore, from 22nd September 2025 to 26th September 2025.
Mr. S. R. Dharan successfully completed the 10-Day Malaviya Mission Teacher Training Programme at Coimbatore from 17th March 2025 to 27th March 2025.

col1.text: Mr. S. R. Dharan, Dr. A. Elakkiya, and Dr. S. Hemalatha

col2.text: Mr. S. R. Dharan, Dr. A. Elakkiya, and Dr. S. Hemalatha successfully completed the 5-Day Faculty Development Program (FDP) on Emerging Research Skills at SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Coimbatore, from 22nd July 2025 to 26th July 2025.
Dr. A. Elakkiya successfully completed the International Conference on Research Perspective in New-Gen Computational Paradigms at St. Joseph’s College for Women, Tirupur, on 12th August 2025.
Mrs. A. Sajuna successfully completed the International Conference on Research Perspective in New-Gen Computational Paradigms at St. Joseph’s College for Women, Tirupur, on 12th August 2025.

Mrs. A. Sajuna successfully published a book chapter titled “Analysis of Autism Children’s Education Using Artificial Intelligence Techniques”, published by Orange Books Publications on 8th August 2025.

Mrs. P. Shalini participated in a Two-Day National Level Conference on “Road Map to Viksit Bharat – A Multi-Disciplinary Approach”, organized by Tamil Nadu Higher Education Teachers Association affiliated to Akhil Bhartiya Rashtriya Shaikshik Mahasangh (ABRSM), New Delhi, in association with Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT), Chennai, from 26th July 2025 to 27th July 2025.

slider.desc: I would like to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude to Karpagam Academy of Higher Education (KAHE) and the Department of Computer Applications for their immense contribution to my academic journey. The unwavering commitment and support of the faculty and staff have greatly enriched my learning experience. I am deeply thankful for the encouragement and guidance that have nurtured my personal and professional growth, strengthened my confidence, and prepared me for future achievements. My sincere appreciation goes to all the mentors and well-wishers whose dedication and hard work have played a vital role in shaping my career. I am truly grateful for the invaluable experiences and opportunities provided during my time at KAHE.

I feel truly privileged to express my heartfelt gratitude for the wholesome experience at Karpagam Academy of Higher Education (KAHE). The well-structured curriculum and the enriching learning environment provided by the Department of Computer Applications have played a significant role in my academic and personal development. I sincerely appreciate the dedicated efforts of the faculty and staff, whose commitment and guidance make KAHE an exceptional place for students to learn and grow. The university beautifully balances both discipline and freedom, ensuring the overall well-being of every student. KAHE truly provides an ideal platform for holistic development, nurturing not only knowledge and skills but also values and confidence for a successful future.

The Department of Computer Applications at Karpagam Academy of Higher Education (KAHE) doesn’t just teach programming—it nurtures creators, innovators, and future entrepreneurs. The department’s commitment to providing a collaborative and inspiring academic environment motivates students to push their limits and think beyond traditional learning. The Computer Applications program strikes a perfect balance between core computing concepts, modern technologies, and entrepreneurial thinking. With a strong emphasis on hands-on projects, industry collaboration, and innovation, the program equips students with the confidence and competence to face real-world challenges.

I am truly grateful for the enriching academic experience I have had at Karpagam Academy of Higher Education (KAHE). The Department of Computer Applications provided a well-structured curriculum that seamlessly blended theoretical knowledge with practical applications, greatly enhancing my technical and analytical skills. The faculty members were highly knowledgeable, supportive, and always willing to provide guidance. The placement cell also played a pivotal role by offering continuous support, which helped me secure a position that perfectly aligns with my career aspirations.

Choosing Karpagam Academy of Higher Education (KAHE) has truly been one of the best decisions of my life. The Department of Computer Applications offers exceptional academic guidance and unwavering faculty support that continuously motivates students to excel. The vibrant and diverse campus environment has broadened my perspective and helped me grow both personally and professionally. The emphasis on hands-on learning, innovation, and career development has set me on a clear path toward achieving my goals.
